input.oldString:
<Button
                        variant="ghost"
                        size="sm"
                        onClick={clearText}
                        className="p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded-full"
                      >
                        <X className="h-4 w-4" />
                      </Button>
input.newString:
<Button
                        variant="ghost"
                        size="sm"
                        onClick={clearText}
                        className="p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded-full"
                        aria-label="Clear text"
                      >
                        <X className="h-4 w-4" />
                      </Button>
